name: Bubble Shooter Pop Classic
description:
New improvements over the classic bubble shooter genre. Let's begin the adventure through the magical land. Gather colorful bubbles to charge up the adventurer's special skills to help you through those tight spots or to burst the most epic combo that will leave your friends speechless when they see your name on the leaderboard.
Bubble Shooter Pop Classic features :
- 6 different challenging game modes.
- 5 characters with unique skills.
- Free bonus every day from daily quest.
- Hundreds of levels which increases with regular updates.
- Works offline. No wifi connection is required.
Bubble Shooter Pop Classic game modes:
Clear the top : Free 6 ceiling bubbles to win the level.
Drop the winkie : Clear the surrounding bubbles to drop the winkie soldier.
Rescue the mouse : Match the bubbles contain the mouses to free them.
Free the munchkin : Drop the bubbles contain the munchkin to free them.
Beat the clock : Clear the map before time run out.
Bubble Shooter Pop Classic is a completely free game which optional in app purchase to help you progress quicker in your adventure in the magical land.


Last but not least, a big THANK YOU to all who played Bubble Shooter Pop Classic
